Kevin Quinteros, Ph.D.

Research

Comparative Phylogeography

We present the first study of genetic differentiation of a widely-distributed fig species, F. petiolaris, and its associated Pegoscapus pollinating wasp over the whole of their range using next-generation sequencing data.

Host-Pollinator Communities

Assessing fig wasp pollinator diversity and host-pollinator associations across the geographic range of multiple Ficus species.

Chemical Ecology of Figs

We present the first case study to compare the floral volatile composition of genetically demonstrated first generation (F1) hybrids and their parental individuals to identify those compounds exhibiting additive or transgressive inheritance.

Comparative Genomics

We present the first case study to compare the floral volatile composition of genetically demonstrated first generation (F1) hybrids and their parental individuals to identify those compounds exhibiting additive or transgressive inheritance.
